name: James Bunkert
text: This place was wonderful! We just moved here from out of town and had no idea that a pizza place would have a gluten free solution for our kids. The pizza tastes delicious...! Honest, it tastes really really good! The gall behind the …More

name: Millie Ledford Lee
text: Their service is great. However, the last pizza I ordered (build your own), the cheese was so salty, I could barely eat it. I ended up tossing half of it in the trash. Why do they suddenly have very salty cheese? I've ordered from Pizza Hut for years, and never had this problem. I'm not sure I will be ordering again.

name: Kirsten Bacorn
text: So I have never had this bad of experience in my life I have been waiting 3 hours for my food and it's still not here they messed up the first time they took longer than said for now both times... and on top of that I tried to talk to the …More

name: Val Casey
text: Man. I'm a sucker for stuffed crust. I wish with all my heart another pizza place made it. This location is the only one that delivers to my apartment, and not only do they make a sub-par pizza compared to other Pizza Huts, but they are …More

name: Jackson Curtin
text: You won't regret the visit. Side note - yes it's in the unassuming building that you wouldn't guess houses a distillery.

name: Samael [Samwiches] Jackson
text: I am mostly giving a review to complain about the fact this Pizza Hut (the only Pizza Hut in my delivery area) closed over what I was told was something along the lines of a forgotten rent payment? …More

name: Antoine Lindsey
text: Horrible service. I will never go there again. Pizza looked weird I didn't even eat I gave it to my dog, Godzilla ha

name: Torque Lewith
text: The pizza I ordered was about a half hour late. It looked like someone sat on the box. When I opened the lid, all of the cheese and toppings had already stuck to the top of the box, on account of being smashed somewhere in the delivery …More

name: Tyler Mays
text: That they remain unavailable and eternally closed to app and online delivery orders means that I have to live in a Pizza Hut food desert in the middle of damn Portland, Oregon. That'll learn me to like their pizzas. :(

name: Matthew Seymour
text: Never again.Pizza was undercooked, smashed to one side of the box like someone threw it on the floor.They offered us credit for next time (like there'd be one) or another order in an hour. Yeah, right.And we even tipped the girl. Should have cooked our own pizzas.

name: Dustin
text: We order from this location at least twice a month and 80% of the time they get it right. This last time we ordered it was just over a half hour late, the pizza was cold, and we're missing toppings. Will order again but it's always a mystery what youll get

name: Prasad r
text: I ordered pizza and they mentioned i will get pizza after 90 mins, i ended up getting after 150 mins. Wonderful service.

name: Stephanie Harkless
text: I ordered Pizza Hut thinking it would be a quick and easy delivery experience. I used the family deal for 2 pizzas,soda & 2 sides of wings with sauces. My delivery time was an HOUR expectancy which is fine for a friday night. Not only did …More

name: Skyla Murray
text: So this is tge third time in a row iv had a horrible experience. The first time they took 2 1\2 hours to show up we had somewhere we had to be. We ended up leaving... …More

name: maria cen
text: Dont buy the pizza at pizza hut cause just for a pizza n hotwings im waiting 1 hour and they say the pizza isnt ready after a few minutes they say that they didnt check the hot wings and guess what they didnt give me my refund!!so yeah dont buy the pizza!!!!!!!!!ps the worst service ever!

name: Mohamed Sadik
text: this is the worst customer service I've ever had a pizza hut in my life. I love Asian people but there was an Asian man i was with on the phone and he was very rude! I recommend any other pizza hut in US.

name: Juan herrera
text: The service was bad but the pizza was delicious!! Ordering over the phone is not a good idea...they sound like they hate the job.

name: Katie Evans
text: Over an hour to get my order, and when it finally arrives, it's cold. If you can order from a different location, do it.

name: Areana Best
text: I love Pizza Hut. Best freaking pizza ever.

name: stacey1872
text: Delucery is the slowest ever. It often takes over an hour to get what I ordered.

name: Nate Stellhorn
text: garbage
